description: This video, presented by Susanna Lobez, is an overview of the Criminal Court and who participates in it, as it currently operates in Australia. Examined is the roles of: The Judge; The Jury; Prosecutor; Instructing solicitor; Defence; Accused person; Witnesses; The Jury room; The Law of Evidence; The Associate; A Civil trial; Sentencing a convicted person. Also discussed is how the law arrived in Australia. Suitable for Mid-Upper Secondary level students.
